member.name: T:LoginGUI.UserStats
member.remarks: UserStats contains methods to parse user and module score XML files, as well as the structures to contain the data of these files.
member.summary: UserStats contains methods to parse user and module score XML files, as well as the structures to contain the data of these files.

member.name: M:LoginGUI.UserStats.parseUserScore(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: parseUserScore parses a user's XML score file to extract significant data and store in a UserScoreNode structure.
member.param: Defines the name of the user whose file to parse.
Defines the name of the game being parsed.
member.returns: A UserScoreData structure that contains all the significant data from username in module.

member.name: M:LoginGUI.UserStats.parseModuleScore(System.String)
member.summary: parseModuleScore parses a module's XML file to extract scores and their corresponding users.
member.param: Defines the name of the module to be parsed.
member.returns: A ModuleScoreData structure that contains all the significant data from module.

member.name: T:LoginGUI.UserStats.UserScoreNode
member.summary: UserScoreNodes hold the date, time and score of a single user score.

member.name: T:LoginGUI.UserStats.UserScoreData
member.summary: UserScoreData holds the username, module, last score, best score, first score, average score, list of UserScoreNodes, and the list size of the recent scores.

member.name: T:LoginGUI.UserStats.ModuleScoreNode
member.summary: ModuleScoreNodes hold the username and score of an individual score.

member.name: T:LoginGUI.UserStats.ModuleScoreData
member.summary: ModuleScoreData holds the module name, a list of ModuleScoreNodes, and the size of this list.
